about_the_game:
🌟 Meet the legendary gods

An ancient legend circulates on the island, and it is said that powerful gods live here, and they have the power to fulfill any wish. But remember, the fulfillment of each wish comes with a price. Are you ready for the challenge?

🔍 Find the missing mother

Our protagonist, a brave explorer, embarks on a journey to find his missing mother. Her last clue points to Beast Island. In order to solve the mystery of his mother's disappearance, he must go deep into this island full of unknowns and dangers.

🎮 Click to decrypt the adventure

"Beast Island" is a challenging click to decrypt game. You will explore by clicking and solving puzzles to uncover the truth hidden behind the ancient legend. Every choice may have unexpected consequences, and every puzzle tests your wisdom.

🌪️ Uncover the fog and discover the truth

Are you ready? Join this adventure, uncover the secrets of Beast Island, find your mother, how will you choose?

💡 Game Features

  • Almost no natural language text in the game flow

  • Traditional point-and-click puzzles, easy to play

  • Unique minimalistic art style

  • Each scene has a unique impressive soundtrack

  • A world where realism and magic meet

  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IGP or better

short_description: Beast Island is a small island far from the mainland, hidden in mist and legend. According to legend, powerful gods live on the island, and they can fulfill any wish of the petitioner, but according to legend, the petitioner must pay a price.
